remarks: Lemma for ~ taylpfval and similar theorems.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Dec-2016.)
statement:
taylpfval.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
taylpfval.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> CC ) $.
taylpfval.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ S ) $.
taylpfval.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
taylpfval.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. dom ( ( S Dn F ) ` N ) ) $.
taylplem2 $p |- ( ( ( ph /\ X e. CC ) /\ k e. ( 0 ... N ) ) -> ( ( ( ( ( S Dn F ) ` k ) ` B ) / ( ! ` k ) ) x. ( ( X - B ) ^ k ) ) e. CC ) $.
$d B k $.
$d F k $.
$d N k $.
$d S k $.
$d X k $.
$d k ph $.
